content: In YAML format, outline the steps required to create a simple origami crane.

Certainly! Here are the steps to create a simple origami crane in YAML format:

```yaml
steps:
  - step: 1
    description: Start with a square piece of paper, colored side up.
  - step: 2
    description: Fold the paper in half diagonally to make a triangle, then unfold.
  - step: 3
    description: Fold the paper in half diagonally the other way to make another triangle, then unfold.
  - step: 4
    description: Fold the paper in half horizontally, then unfold.
  - step: 5
    description: Fold the paper in half vertically, then unfold.
  - step: 6
    description: Bring all four corners of the paper to the center point, forming a smaller square.
  - step: 7
    description: Fold the top layer of the left and right flaps inward to the center line.
  - step: 8
    description: Fold the top triangle down.
  - step: 9
    description: Unfold the last two folds to create inside reverse folds.
  - step: 10
    description: Repeat steps 7-9 on the other side.
  - step: 11
    description: Fold the model in half, bringing the top to the bottom.
  - step: 12
    description: Fold the top layers of the wings down.
  - step: 13
    description: Gently pull the head and tail apart, adjusting the wings as needed.
  - step: 14
    description: Your origami crane is now complete!
```

I hope this helps you create a beautiful origami crane!
